entry.title: My Must-Have iPhone Apps, 2014 Edition – MacStories
entry.content:
Frederico Viticci:

At the end of the article, you’ll also find my iPhone App of the Year and a Runner-up. Each app has a direct iTunes link, and, where possible, I’ve included links to previous MacStories coverage as well.

Saya selalu suka membaca setiap artikel Frederico Viticci di Macstories. Tak hanya menyajikan review, namun @viticci juga mengulasnya secara komprehensif dan mendalam.
